text: Don't like to give orders, like to improve everything, You are included.
Love results, hate processes. If there is a way to get results without process, I will definitely find it.
I'm a lion person (like a cat one but with a loud roar).
If I repeat 10 times this is not possible, it means I have some proofs. It won't become possible if you ignore them.
Like to move by small steps, don't like rushing.
Like to get maximum out of what I have, won't search for something new if I can use the existing one.
Hate spaghetti. If you would like to hear my roar, start asking to make ones 10 times in a row.

I know that someone said 'Why do you expect different results by doing the same thing again and again?' — it doesn't work on me. I get new results on the same input again and again. If results come to stability, this means I'm sure there is no other way.
Hate to do everything by myself. We are who we are due to uniting, not because someone had big biceps.
Brains are a muscle. If you need them, you must train them. Ask me and I will give you some tips! But don't cry when your brain starts crushing.
Don't say 'Maris, I'm okay with it' if it's not true. I will eat you like an ice-cream (with taste).
Love predictable risk, hate risks that are not calculated.
If I fall, I will jump right back. Anything that doesn't kill me makes me stronger.
Don't be scared that you will harm my feelings. If that happens, your feelings will be in the same state.
I'm a mirror — I throw back everything you throw at me (it will fly even if I won't be able to lift it).
Try harder is good, but think smarter is better!
If you ask me to do something in the middle of the night, it will be done. But I will expect that we’ll work to make sure it never happens again.
I believe that valuable things need time. If you make something fast, why do you expect it to live another day without a problem?
If I can calculate it, I won't do it — as the result is fully predictable.
Lazy bastard making the maximum out of doing nothing.
The only place where I stopped automating everything is games, because then you need to find a new one.
My ideas are unique. If you think they are not, then you just never discussed anything with me.
I respect all people, no matter their status, skills, or any other thing that seems important for most people.
